Articles.Content:
I just read an article quoting an Apollo communications specialist saying that soviet subs were attempting to interfere with the communications with the Apollo spacecraft

https://www.clarionledger.com/story/magnolia/2018/07/20/russia-and-nasa-soviets-tried-mess-up-moon-landing-apollo-11/803975002/

It seems pretty surprising, if anything had gone wrong it would have been far to easy to point the finger for a pretty significant PR victory.

Has anyone ever heard anything like this before and are there any more official sources?
